name: Refresh
description: When I'm walking, biking, or running, I can find the closest public water fountain with which to fill up my water bottle. Uses Ruby on Rails, React, Postgres, and the Google Maps APIs

name: ihatecooking
description: Based on whatever ingredients I already have in my fridge, the maximum time I'm willing to spend, and my mood, this app will generate easy-to-make recipes for me. Uses Ruby on Rails, React, the Meal Plantastic API, and a Raspberry Pi.

name: CoffeeBuddies
description: Matches up people new to a city, based on their interests, for conversations over coffee! People can exchange messages in real-time to determine their compatibility prior to grabbing coffee. Uses Ruby on Rails, React, and the Twilio API.
